name: SOLLEY
description:
Hi All,

I made SOLLEY for the 7 Days GJAM as a fun little learning project. 100% coding, music, art (there is none, lol) is done by me.
The theme -Keep it Alive- reminded me of the childhood game of keeping a balloon from hitting the floor, so I created a solo-volley game (solley) to emulate that (with some creative ways to increase difficulty :D).
I learned so much making this game, and am eager to participate in the WOWIE jam happening now, so my game lacks some polish, but it's as done as I want it to be.

I hope you all have fun with my project, and best of luck to anyone else participating in this jam. 

Creator's high scores:
Easy: Infinity
Medium: 113
Hard: 43
You will have earned my full respect if you achieve a score of 50 on Hard mode.

Thank you all so much,
-Thxrst

(ps. click around the screen on the difficulty select screen for a small easter egg feature)
